channel.title: Need Help / Information offering 10mil in game runescape gold or skiller acc
channel.description:
[size=36pt]I got some tricky questions that need Answering[/size]
1: I plan to start a 317 server what type of server computer do i need?
2: What are some good advertising aproches?
3: How do I get my server reconized?
4: Where can I find/learn how to make a good admin panel for my server?
5: What are the best ways to sacure my server from hackers?
6: How do i make it where i have multiple worlds but you can acess your same acc from each one?
7: How do i make a Web Client for my server?
8: When i get a server computer how would i run a website off it?
Thanks for any info you can give me if you can help email me at hiperpoo@gmail.com thanks for your time!

item.title: Need Help / Information offering 10mil in game runescape gold or skiller acc
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

  1. Doesn’t matter about the computer, it’s the server quality.

  2. Youtube, Toplists, Google ADS, RSPS Communities etc.

  3. Make sure it’s unique and professional.

  4. You shouldn’t need one.

  5. Get an understanding of basic Java and the rs2 protocol.

  6. There are two ways, the completely inefficient way, and the proper way.

inefficient: Run your server on different ports
effcient: Modify your server to use more than one thread

It’s honestly not that hard, you need an understanding of Java though.

  1. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,336494.0.html

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help / Information offering 10mil in game runescape gold or skiller acc
